name: Visage

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.desc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.desc: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.    Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

bio: Perched atop the entrance to the Narrow Maze sit the looming shapes of sneering gargoyles, the paths into the hereafter forever in their gaze.  Beasts and birds, men and monsters, all creatures that die and choose to travel beyond must someday pass beneath their sight.  For an untethered spirit, the decision to journey through the veil of death is irrevocable.  When chance comes, and by craft or cunning some restless soul escapes their hells and heavens, it is the dreaded gargoyle Visage, the bound form of the eternal spirit Necro'lic, who is dispatched to reclaim them.  Ruthless and efficient, unhindered by the principles of death and fatigue, Visage stalks its prey without mercy or end, willingly destroying all which may give shelter to the fugitive essence.  That which flaunts the laws of the afterlife may never rest, for while it is true that the dead may be revived, it is only a matter of time before Visage finds and returns them to their proper place.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
abilities.lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.desc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
abilities.lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
abilities.lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.desc: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.    Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
